participant_1.background:
I'm not married yet, but I'm hoping to find someone who appreciates my cardigan collection.
i make 50k a year.
i try to eat healthy or i do not eat at all.
I love that I get to be around my pets all day.
I'm always on the lookout for new and exciting ways to challenge myself, both physically and mentally.

participant_2.background:

my wife is a breast cancer survivor.
i enjoy comedies.
and , my best friend is abigail.
I want to find a way to keep my curly hair in place.

content.text: Hey! How's it going?
Good! Just got back from work, how about you?
Doing good, just got done working out.
Oh nice, what was your workout?
I just did a basic run, followed by some strength training.
Oh cool, I love going for runs! What's your favorite thing about it?
I love the feeling of being free and the sense of accomplishment when I finish.
I totally get that. I also love the way it clears my head.
Do you do any other forms of exercise?
Yeah, I also like to do yoga and lift weights.
Nice! I've been wanting to try yoga but I'm not very flexible.
It's a great way to stretch and improve your flexibility. I'd recommend giving it a try!
I think I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
You're welcome! What do you do for work?
I'm a personal trainer!
Oh cool! I've always been curious about that. What's it like?
It's great! I love helping people achieve their fitness goals.
That sounds really rewarding.
It is! I love seeing my clients progress and get healthier.
I bet that's really satisfying.
It is! I'm glad I get to do it for a living.
That's awesome
